vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.44;
son of: Abdi (H5660);
father of: Jeduthun (H3038); also called Kushaiah at 1Ch.15.17;
Also named: qu.sha.ya.hu (קוּשָׁיָ֫הוּ "Kushaiah" H6984)
§ Kishi = "bow of Jehovah"
a Merarite Levite, father or ancestor of Ethan the minstrel in the time of David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Etán, cantor del templo; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基示 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的弓"
米拉利的利未人 (代上 6:44)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基示 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的弓"
米拉利的利未人 (代上 6:44)
